person.persName: Melissa Bailey (Magoffin County, Kentucky, resident & convicted of adultery)

body.p: Magoffin County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Daughter of Wallis and Polly Bailey. Married to Wiley Adams in Magoffin County, Kentucky, on August 15, 1861. Mother of Franklin Adams, Harrison Adams, Maude J. Adams, Newton P. Adams, Lucinda Adams, and Jane Adams. Resident of Floyd County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Magoffin County in 1860. Charged with adultery in the Floyd Circuit Court in January 1861. Remitted by Governor Beriah Magoffin on January 26, 1861.
